name: EDD Invoice Data
author: upSell.pl & Better Profits

sections.description:
English below

EDD Invoice Data, to moduł do Easy Digital Downloads, który pozwala na łatwe zbieranie danych do faktury przy składaniu zamówienia. Pobieranie dodatkowych danych można aktywować dla dowolnej bramki płatności EDD.

Możliwości

  • Pobieranie danych do faktury dla dowolnej bramki płatności EDD
  • Podanie danych do faktury może być opcjonalne lub wymagane
  • Pobranie danych do faktury od osoby fizycznej (imię, nazwisko i adres)
  • Zebrane dane mogą być wykorzystane przez moduły integrujące z systemami fakturującymi (WP Fakturownia, WP Taxe, WP iFirma, WP wFirma)

Kontakt

  • Jeśli masz jakiekolwiek sugestie dotyczące wtyczki – pisz śmiało! Kontakt znajdziesz na naszej stronie upSell.pl
  • Koniecznie zajrzyj też do nas na Twittera: @upsell_pl
  • I polub nas na Facebooku: upSell.pl na FB

English version

EDD Invoice Data is add-on plugin for Easy Digital Downloads plugin, which allows you to easily gather invoice data for any EDD payment gateway during checkout.

Features

  • Gathering the invoice data for any payment gateway
  • Provide the invoice details can be optional or required
  • Getting the invoice data from a individual (name and address)
  • Dedicated mainly for EU entrepreneurs

Translations

  • English – default, always included
  • Polish: tak, tak – to przecież polska wtyczka!
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory edd-invoice-data and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Downloads -> Settings -> Gateways and set your preferences.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • New: ability to turn off the Tax ID verification on the checkout
  • Fix: missing constant
  • Tweak: removed asterix on street field desription

1.2

  • New: ability to add / edit invoice data on purchase details screen
  • New: invoice data are now remembered for logged user

1.1.1

  • Tweak: Better Tax ID validation

1.1

  • New: The ability to hide EDD’s first name and last name fields
  • Tweak: Better input data validation
  • Update: Polish translation

1.0.2

  • Fix: New Polish translation files

1.0.1

  • Fix: Invoice form was not correct displayed for all settings

1.0

  • First release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory edd-invoice-data and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Downloads -> Settings -> Gateways and set your preferences.

short_description: This plugin allows you to gather invoice data for any EDD payment gateway.
